meanings.definition: A person who marvels or is amazed.
meanings.sent1: The children were wide-eyed marvelers at the circus.
meanings.sent2: The audience members were all marvelers at the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled, watching the puppies play, a true marveler at heart.
meanings.sent4: She was a marveler of nature's beauty, finding wonder in every flower and tree.
meanings.sent5: As the fireworks lit up the sky, the crowd turned into a sea of marvelers.
